name: Crime Custodian
description:
Description:

In Crime Custodian, you play as an employee of a custodial service that will clean any mess, no questions asked. Due to the nature of the business, each site will have time constraints. Use your mop to clean up, pick up any debris that may have been left behind, then bring the trash bags to the dumpster, and make sure to use the blacklight and your discerning eye to pinpoint any evidence invisible to the naked eye. Please be advised that we are the utmost in professionalism, so failure to complete the job in time will result in you taking the fall. Nothing personal.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Q - Toggle black-light

Mouse - Aim your black-light

LMB - Mop evidence

RMB - Pick up trash and trash bags
